metadata.title: Carcinoembryonic Antigen-Related Cell Adhesion Molecule 1 Modulates Experimental Autoimmune Encephalomyelitis via an iNKT Cell-Dependent Mechanism

abstract.original_text: . MOG 35-55 -specific T cell responses in J␣18 Ϫ/Ϫ mice treated with CEACAM1-Fc fusion protein or with AgB10. J␣18 Ϫ/Ϫ mice were treated with CEACAM1-Fc fusion protein (A) or AgB10 (B) twice per week from the day of immunization with MOG 35-55. Eleven days after the immunization, draining lymph node cells were incubated with MOG 35-55. Supernatants were collected from the culture and measured for the concentration of IFN-␥ and IL-17 by ELISA. Data represent the mean Ϯ SEM of samples from one of two independent experiments (n ϭ 3 mice).
